entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
